title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2ยง 7.6 - Items manufactured by correctional institutions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2ยง 7.6 - Items manufactured by correctional institutions

State Regulations

Articles required by State agencies which are manufactured by
institutions of the Department of Correctional Services shall be purchased from
the Department of Correctional Services at prices fixed by the Commissioner of
the Office of General Services and the Commissioner of Correctional Services, unless a release certifying that the articles cannot be furnished is issued by
the Commissioner of Correctional Services. This does not apply to printing. (Correction Law, sections 184, 186.)

Notes

7.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
